languages.text: "Я никогда не подвергала эту мысль сомнению, элантах. Гемункул представляет угрозу для обоих наших видов. Ты и сам{mf||а} знаешь, на что способно его черное сердце и извращенный разум. Тервантьяс должен быть уничтожен, и мои собратья приняли на себя роль клинка возмездия".

traits.locale_text: "Я никогда не подвергала эту мысль сомнению, элантах. Гемункул представляет угрозу для обоих наших видов, элантах. Ты и сам{mf||а} знаешь, на что способно его черное сердце и извращенный разум. Тревентьяс должен быть уничтожен, и мои собратья приняли на себя роль клинка возмездия".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."
languages.original_text: "Я никогда не подвергала эту мысль сомнению, элантах. Гемункул представляет угрозу для обоих наших видов. Ты и сам{mf||а} знаешь, на что способно его черное сердце и извращенный разум. Тервантьяс должен быть уничтожен, и мои собратья приняли на себя роль клинка возмездия".

traits.locale_text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark hart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kinsmen took on the role of the vengeful blade."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kinsmen took on the role of the vengeful blade."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Nunca lo he dudado, elantach. El hemónculo es una amenaza para nuestras dos especies. Sabes bien de qué son capaces su oscuro corazón y su mente perversa. Tervantias debe ser destruido, y mis congéneres han asumido el papel de la espada vengadora».
languages.original_text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: «Nunca lo he dudado, elantach. El hemónculo es una amenaza para nuestras dos especies. Sabes bien de qué son capaces su oscuro corazón y su mente perversa. Tervantias debe ser destruido, y mis congéneres han asumido el papel de la espada vengadora».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这一点我从来没有怀疑过，外界人。血伶人对我们两个种族都是威胁。你很清楚，血伶人阴暗的内心与邪恶的思想能做出多么可怕的事情。我们必须消灭特万提亚斯，而我的族人会承担起复仇之刃的角色。”
languages.original_text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: “这一点我从来没有怀疑过，外界人。血伶人对我们两个种族都是威胁。你很清楚，血伶人阴暗的内心与邪恶的思想能做出多么可怕的事情。我们必须消灭特万提亚斯，而我的族人会承担起复仇之刃的角色。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'en ai jamais douté, elantach. L'hémoncule est une menace pour nos deux espèces ; vous savez aussi bien que moi de quoi son cœur noir et son esprit pervers sont capables. Il faut éliminer Tervantias, et les miens ont endossé le rôle de la lame vengeresse qui le pourfendra. »
languages.original_text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en ai jamais douté, elantach. L'hémoncule est une menace pour nos deux espèces ; vous savez aussi bien que moi de quoi son cœur noir et son esprit pervers sont capables. Il faut éliminer Tervantias, et les miens ont assumé le rôle de la lame vengeresse qui le pourfendra. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「疑ったことはない、エランタ。ハモンキュラスは我々の種族にとって脅威だ。その暗い心と倒錯した精神が何をしでかすか、あなたはよく知っているはずだ。テルヴァンティアスを滅ぼさなければならない。そして、我が血族が復讐の刃の役割を引き受けたのだ」
languages.original_text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: 「疑ったことはない、エランタ。ハモンキュラスは我々の種族にとって脅威だ。その暗い心と倒錯した精神が何をしでかすか、あなたはよく知っているはずだ。テルヴァンティアスを滅ぼさなければならない。そして、我が血族が復讐の刃の役割を引き受けたのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Daran habe ich nie gezweifelt, Elantach. Der Haemonculus ist eine Gefahr für unser beider Spezies. Ihr wisst genau, wozu sein dunkles Herz und sein pervertierter Verstand fähig sind. Tervantias muss vernichtet werden, und meine Verwandten haben die Rolle der rachsüchtigen Klinge übernommen."
languages.original_text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: "Daran habe ich nie gezweifelt, Elantach. Der Haemonculus ist eine Gefahr für unser beider Spezies. Ihr wisst genau, wozu sein dunkles Herz und sein pervertierter Verstand fähig sind. Tervantias muss vernichtet werden, und meine Verwandten haben die Rolle der rachsüchtigen Klinge übernommen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bundan hiç şüphem olmadı elantach. Haimonkulus, ikimizin halkı için de tehdit teşkil ediyor. Onun karanlık kalbinin ve sapkın zihninin neler yapabileceğini çok iyi biliyorsun. Tervantias'ın yok edilmesi ve intikam kılıcı rolünü de soydaşlarımın üstlenmesi gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "I never doubted it, elantach. The Haemonculus is a threat to both our species. You know well what his dark heart and perverted mind are capable of. Tervantias must be destroyed, and my kin have taken on the role of vengeful blade."

traits.locale_text: "Bundan hiç şüphem olmadı elantach. Haimonkulus, ikimizin halkı için de tehdit teşkil ediyor. Onun karanlık kalbinin ve sapkın zihninin neler yapabileceğini çok iyi biliyorsun. Tervantias'ın yok edilmesi ve intikam kılıcı rolünü de soydaşlarımın üstlenmesi gerekiyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
